tool_description: Collects customer reviews and ratings data from specified competitors across multiple platforms and time periods.

competitor_names.description: List of competitor company or product names to collect reviews for

platforms.description: Platforms to collect from (amazon, google, yelp, trustpilot, facebook, etc.)

start_date.description: Start date for review collection period

end_date.description: End date for review collection period

max_reviews_per_competitor.description: Maximum number of reviews to collect per competitor

include_metadata.description: Whether to include reviewer metadata (verified purchase, review helpfulness, etc.)

error_messages: Invalid date range: start_date must be earlier than end_date and both must be valid ISO 8601 format.
Platform access denied: One or more specified platforms are not accessible or require authentication.
Competitor not found: One or more competitor names could not be located on the specified platforms.
Rate limit exceeded: Too many requests made to platform APIs, reduce max_reviews_per_competitor or retry later.
Invalid platform name: Use supported platform names like amazon, google, yelp, trustpilot, facebook.
usage: Specify competitor names, platforms, date range, and optional limits. The tool returns raw review data that can be processed by other analysis tools.

total_reviews_collected.description: Total number of reviews successfully collected

competitor_counts.description: Number of reviews collected for each competitor in order

collection_summary.description: Summary of data collection results and any issues encountered
